title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my health conditions and send medication reminders so that I can manage my well-being and stay independent.

title: Medication Management Assistance
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications and alert me of any missed doses so that I can manage my health effectively and maintain my independence.

title: Emergency Alert System
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive immediate alerts in case of an emergency, so that I can ensure my safety and get help when needed.

title: Personalized Health Insights
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive personalized health insights and reminders so that I can manage my health conditions effectively and stay on track with my wellness goals.

title: Caregiver Access to Health Data
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregivers to have access to my health data so that they can monitor my well-being and provide timely assistance when needed.

title: Daily Health Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medication and monitor my health so that I can manage my arthritis pain and stay healthy.

title: User Health History Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily track my health history through voice commands so that I can monitor my well-being and share relevant information with my caregivers and family.

title: Health Goal Setting and Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to set and track my health goals with ALFRED so that I can manage my physical well-being and stay motivated to maintain an active lifestyle.
